The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun
The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[12 January|12]]''' - Musician [[Glenn Yarbrough]] is born.

==February==
* '''[[27 February|27]]''' - [[Joseph Wright]], former tutor of Tolkien, dies.

==April==
* '''[[18 April|18]]''' - [[Clive Revill]], who would voice [[Thorin]] in the [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|2003 video game]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', is born.
==May==
* '''[[27 May|27]]''' - The  University Press of Oxford sends [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] a copy of [[List of books in Tolkien's library#A Middle English Reader|''A Middle English Reader]]''.
* '''[[29 May|29]]''' - "[[The Oxford English School]]", an essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published in ''The Oxford Magazine''.
==June==
* '''[[3 June|3]]''' - Author [[Marion Zimmer Bradley]] is born.
* '''[[9 June|9]]''' - Author [[Lin Carter]] is born.
==August==
* '''[[25 August|25]]''' - [[Bruce Allpress]], who would play Aldor in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]], is born. 
==September==
* '''[[23 September|23]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] completes a manuscript of [[The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun]] 
* '''[[28 September|28]]''' - Illustrator [[Livia Rusz]] is born.

==November==
* '''[[28 November|28]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
==December==
* '''[[24 December|24]]''' - Father Christmas writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
==?==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] completes a full draft of ''[[The Silmarillion]]'', which is later printed in ''[[The Shaping of Middle-earth]]''.
* '''?''' - ''[[War in Heaven]]'', first novel of [[Inklings|Inkling]] [[Charles Williams]], is published.

{{Years|1927|1928|1929|1930|1931|1932|1933|}}
